deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 1 hr 35 mins
features: STRONG SUCTION & ULTRA QUIET OPERATION：With a 250W brushless motor, Fabuletta cordless stick vacuum provides 24,000Pa of suction power on MAX mode, making it easy to capture debris, dust, pet hair, and more. Plus, it's ultra-quiet, generating only 63db of noise.

FREE-STANDING & MULTI-FUNCTION & LIGHTWEIGHT：Weighing only 3.3lb, this vacuum is perfect for one-hand cleaning. With a self-standing design and multiple accessories, it can be assembled into 6 different combinations to meet all your cleaning needs.

LONG-LASTING BATTERY & DETACHABLE DESIGN: With 7 x 2200 large-capacity rechargeable batteries, this stick vacuum cleaner cordless provides up to 45 minutes of cleaning time. Plus, the detachable battery can be charged singly or on its main body.

FLEXIBLE LED MOTORIZED BRUSH & LED DISPLAY：The 180° swivel brush and 3 LED lights make it easy to clean in all directions, while the LED display shows suction level, brush roller cleaning indication, and HEPA filter cleaning indication.

HIGH-EFFICIENCY FILTRATION SYSTEM：With all-new cyclone technology and high-density meshing, this vacuum can clean up to 99.99% of microscopic dust particles as small as 0.3 microns. Plus, the washable HEPA filter ensures purified air for your family. We offer 12-month 100% satisfactory after-sales service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FABULETTA FSV001 Vacuum Cleaner - Powerful and Convenient Cordless Vacuum for Easy Cleaning

Rechargable & Detachable Battery The detachable design also allows you to buy one more battery pack if needed. Great for cleaning the whole home. Learn more High Efficiency Filtration System The cordless vacuum cleaner has a complete sealing design, and a high-density washable HEPA filter that captures 99.99% of the dust. Learn more Motorized Brush with LED Headlight Clean every nook and cranny with ease Learn more

Previous page The free-standing design requires no drilling and nothing which could damage your walls. 2.15 lbs Lightweight for everyday quick clean-ups Easily maneuver around your home with this lightweight vacuum cleaner that won't weigh you down. Effortlessly clean your entire home with this powerful cordless stick vacuum cleaner. Next page 1 Free Standing Design 2 Lightweight Vacuum 3 6-in-1 Combination 4 Powerful Motor & Suction

Special Features Retractable Metal Tube With the extensible wand, you can easily adjust it from 27'' to 35'', practical and save storage space. Two Charging Methods You can charge the stick vacuum directly or simply charge the separate part. With overcharge protection design, you can charge the vacuum overnight. One-click Dust Release Just one click of the button under the dustbin to empty the trash to avoid getting your hands dirty. Ultra-Quiet Operation The stick vacuum cleaner operates at less than 63 dB(A), no need to worry about disturbing your families or pets.

Can the charger adapter support 220V volts? The adapter is a 2 prong charger, it can be used for 110V -220V volts. Can I leave the battery plugged in/charging until I need it? Will it overcharge and damage it? The battery must be charged by the original adapter only , and it will automatically protect against overcharging after fully charged. Other chargers cannot be used in this way to avoid risks. Can the battery last for 45 minutes? The vacuum cleaner will work up to 45 mins on low speed, 20-30 mins on medium speed and 10-15 mins on Max speed. The working time is tested by hand vacuum, working time will also depend on different the floor types.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive Cordless Vacuum
reviews.reviewText: I'm going to keep this as simple as possible. I was impressed, but wanted to try some other vacuums that had higher rated suction power such as 48k or more. Keep in mind, the suction on this one is rated at 24k. You'd think more, the better. Uh, no. Either this has more suction as advertised, or the others are actually rated lower than this one. This does great on hard floors, rugs, and carpets. (At least for the types in my home). It has three levels of suction. Medium is ideal for hard floors and the type of rug I have. I wouldn't do the highest level. The highest level would be better for carpet, but most of the time medium would do just fine. Battery life is pretty good. Charges pretty quick. Maintenance is easy. Assembly is also easy. The tools work great. This product is worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Full review! Pros and cons!
reviews.reviewText: Okay, so I would like to give this vacuum a 4.5 star review but obviously can’t do that. It is a very good vacuum cleaner overall. If you are looking for something lightweight and functional for your hard surface floors. . . This is hands down one of the best and most affordable options. If you want a stick vacuum that can get pet fur off your couch, it’s not bad. Not the best but not the worst either. Same goes for carpet. It’ll work, but a more expensive Dyson or Shark vacuum would work better on a couch or carpet. That being said, my wife and I love this one for all of our hard wood floors. The pros:- LED headlight (love this, can easily see all of the pet fur)- Great swivel on the vacuum head- EASY to release canister for emptying- Three different suction speeds- Easy to clean vacuum head and canister - Multiple attachments for cleaning different surfaces- Very lightweight for a stick vacuum- Relatively quiet- Will lock into and upright position for easy storage/charging- Battery life has been great for us. We can vacuum our kitchen, dining room, living room, hallway, and bathrooms all on one charge while running the vacuum on medium speed setting (I’ve seen mixed reviews on this)- Recharges within an hour or twoCons:- The suction power is good, but not great. Definitely could work for a quick pass over low pile carpet, but it’s not going to be ideal for medium or high pile carpet or for deep vacuuming it- The roller brush wheel doesn’t rotate very well on carpet or on our couches. While you can still use it, it’s just not the best option as I said previously.Overall it’s a very good vacuum for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great but poor battery life
reviews.reviewText: There is so much I love about this vacuum. It works great on hardwood and carpet, the attachments make it possible to clean basically any surface, it’s super lightweight and it can reach under all of my furniture due to its slim design and ability for the handle to fold completely down without tilting the roller part up. For the price, I don’t think you could get better. My one and only complaint is the battery life. I knew it only lasted 40 minutes max however I was not considering the fact that the battery would run out quicker when being used at higher speeds. I pretty much only use the high or medium speed settings because I have 12 animals so I have a lot of hair and messes and to pick up. It normally dies when I have about 2 rooms of the house left. I did purchase a back up battery so I can keep one charged all the time. If you plan to use it for big jobs or have a large house I recommend doing the same.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: JUST RECEIVED AND HAD TO REVIEW.I had a Dyson V8 Animal Stick. I got it years ago (I'm sure there have been improvements since then) but much happier with this.Compared to my Dyson1) STORAGE It Click-locks to stand in place. My dyson I would lean against something and it would slip/wheel away and crash to the ground. This stays put. easy storage in the closet2) BATTERY pack detaches from the unit. Dyson had to be plugged in somewhere - in view (unless you have an outlet IN a closet somewhere). This - the vac and unit is away in the closet and the battery pack (the size of my fist) is plugged in on the counter next to my phone. Also -besides other issues - the battery pack can easily be replaced when the chargeability starts to fail. I just did a quick end of day vac around my 1700 sq foot home - high power - battery lasted fine. Did floors and carpet, picked up dog hair, pieces of un-munched dog bones and random things without issue.3) WEIGHT. I get the Dyson has a powerful motor but this is maybe a third the weight - so much easier to navigate4) MANUVERABILITY zip zip around everything. fits between chairs and side tables - easy to wheely under tables. The vacuum width is narrower, but I don't mind rolling more to be able to fit in hard to reach spaces more.5) SOUND- quieter... enough said6) DIRT CHAMBER - the dyson held more but this is a stick vac, a quick swipe, not my big vac - chamber is more than adequate. easier to take apart - just less piecesI have:Shark robot self emptying vac: perfect to set to vac at night while we sleep, or when I'm cleaning the house it works ahead of me as we go - and I vac behind. Ranch style home - best purchase ever! (I call him Buster Dustless)Bissel clean view corded vacuum: love this for my monthly deep cleaning. Great suction.Bissel Crosswave mop: I loathe mopping - SO happy with this purchase. I use combo white vinegar and lavender cleaner for a clean steak free and fresh smell.And now the FABULETTA Cordless Vacuum Cleaner.For the price paid... I would rather have a couple of these around the house with maybe a battery back up (If I only used this) rather than paying the $$$ for the Dyson V8.

reviews.reviewTitle: Mieux que Dyson, 3 fois moins cher
reviews.reviewText: Silencieux, super pratique, il tient debout tout seul. De nombreux accessoires de qualité.Inutile de dépenser plus.Je recommande vivement

reviews.reviewTitle: Would be 5 stars if battery lasted longer and picked up more things
reviews.reviewText: It’s been amazing for vacuuming dog hair and it’s actually very lightweight much easier than my other vacuumPros:-picks up dog hair-lightweight-different ways of using it-battery detachable-light in front shows hairs you’re missing-open clasp for bin of garbage I just open and everything falls straight to the garbage without me handling it muchCons:-battery runs out really fast-charges in 2-3 hours-long hair gets stuck in it and it doesn’t come out-small pieces of dirt fly off and I’ve been hit a few times from the little garbages it’s picked up it shoots it outI use it for dog hair primarily as my other vacuum didn’t pick it up muchReference for dog: miniature pinschers short hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We bought this cordless vacuum cleaner around six months ago (the red version). I thought I'd wait a while before writing a review so I could see how it got on. Firstly, before deciding on this Fabuletta, I spent a good few weeks looking for a decent cordless under £200 - after reading so many reviews, specs and details decided this was going to be the one. The majority of the house is carpeted, so was concerned about suction power on carpet. I have to say we've not been disappointed.Out of the box, it looks and feels good. I decided to hoover the living room using our cumbersome corded vacuum beforehand to see what this could do. We were shocked at just how much it picked up on it's first test run (and that wasn't even on full power - we've hardly ever needed to use it on full). And it runs pretty quiet too. Amazing.So light and easy to use too - I hated hoovering until we got this. Now I can just grab it and go round every couple of days for a few minutes. Easy to use on the stairs - being cordless, you don't have those issues. With the attachments making the smaller areas easy enough too, and they're so easy to attach and swap with a click switch. Easy to empty out into the bin (another click and open) and cleaning the filter's not as bad as I expectedReally impressed with this - just wish we'd found it sooner (although our dog wouldn't agree - she hates it!).
la batterie ne dure pas 45mn et la charge est très lente , sinon bon rapport qualité prix
